edu.thangiah.action

Class ValidationAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
      • edu.thangiah.action.AbstractAction
        • edu.thangiah.action.ValidationAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.Action, com.opensymphony.xwork2.LocaleProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.Preparable, com.opensymphony.xwork2.TextProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.Validateable, com.opensymphony.xwork2.ValidationAware, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseManagementController, MaintenanceOrder

    public abstract class ValidationAction
extends AbstractAction
    This class is meant to be extended by Action classes wishing to utilize Struts2 validation on form input. This is primarily extended by ManagementController classes. See edu.thangiah.action.BaseManagementController for reference.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kelly Smith
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
